info.title: Pinup Backend API's Specification
info.description: Pinup is not a Software product, it is a thinking which make your task easy and efficient. And we are plotting our thining in software product. Which will make our work easy. Basically we are planning to make product based on some different technologies.

post.description: Register the Admin for the pinup.

parameters.name: emailID
parameters.description: Provide a valid email address to authenticate. e.g. your@some-domain.com

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: Provide a valid email address to authenticate. e.g. your@some-domain.com

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Provide a valid Password

200.description: Admin registered successful

401.description: Admin registered failed

post.description: Register domain name under the Admin account for the pinup.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Provide a valid sub-domain name, It should be unique for the domain e.g. tech, prog, news etc. for tech.pinup.com / news.pinup.com

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Domain name selection successfull

401.description: Domain name selection failed

post.description: It authenticates the user email from company database and it returns success response with email and token. For every REST call you need to pass token and crossponding email with some extra request body which is based on REST call's

parameters.name: emailID
parameters.description: Provide a valid email address to authenticate. e.g. your@some-domain.com

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Provide a valid Password

200.description: Authentcation Successful

401.description: Authentcation Failure

post.description: Admin sigout, remove the sessions & cookie values.

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Administrator sigout successful

post.description: Send invites to the email address.

parameters.name: emailID
parameters.description: Valid Email ID should be provided to send the email notification with the domain & token verification value.

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Sending the notification successfully & inviting the user.

401.description: Failed to validate email ID OR Filed to send notification

post.description: Through this API admin can add topics to the said sub domain

parameters.name: topic
parameters.topic: Topic name for the current sub domain
parameters.description: Valid topic should be provided

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Adding the topic to the said sub domain.

401.description: Topic additin validation errors OR other errors

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Get the topic details for the sub domain.

401.description: Failed to get the topic details for sub doamin

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Get the list of topics for the sub domain.

401.description: Failed to get the topics for sub doamin

post.description: Through this API admin can update topic details to the said sub domain

parameters.name: topicID
parameters.description: Valid topic ID will update the topic details

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Adding the pinup data using scrape process.

401.description: URL validation or Pinup scrape process failed

post.description: Remove the topic from the sub domain

parameters.name: topicID
parameters.description: Valid topic ID will update the topic details

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Remove the topic from the sub domain.

401.description: Unable to remove the topic from the Sub domain

post.description: Recently added pinup data with the Reference URL link (scraper) for the admin sub domain.

parameters.name: pinupurl
parameters.description: Valid URL should be provided. The scrape process will work to dig the title, image, keywords, tags, description, main link from the link.

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Adding the pinup data using scrape process.

401.description: URL validation or Pinup scrape process failed

get.description: Get the pinup details for the added pinup

parameters.name: pinupID
parameters.description: Pinup ID required to filter the pinup data from the pinup schema

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Get the pinup data based on the Pinup ID passed

401.description: Pinup data failed to fetch

get.description: Remove the pinup from the sub doamin

parameters.name: pinupID
parameters.description: Pinup ID required to filter the pinup data from the pinup schema

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Remove (Soft detete) the pinup

401.description: Failed to soft delete the pinup

post.description: Update the pinup details e.g. title, image, tags, description etc.

parameters.name: pinupID
parameters.pinupID: Pinup ID to identify & update the pinup
parameters.description: Validate the correct pinup using pinup ID

parameters.name: title
parameters.title: Title of the pinup
parameters.description: Title field for the pinup

parameters.name: imageUrl
parameters.imageUrl: Image for the pinup, Validate the pinup at the backend.
parameters.description: URL field for the pinup

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description regarding the pinup url added
Description field for the pinup

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags field for the pinup

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Updating the pinup data using pinup ID.

401.description: URL validation or Pinup scrape process failed

get.description: Recently added pinup data with the Reference URL link (scraper) for the admin sub domain.

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: You need to pass token along with your request.

200.description: Successful get the eecently added pinups by the admin

get.description: Set the default recommended pinups from the backend only set 10.

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: You need to pass token along with your request.

200.description: Successful get the recently added pinups by the admin

get.description: Recomended pinups based on the cookies and views of the pinup details.

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: You need to pass token along with your request.

200.description: Successful get the eecently added pinups by the admin

post.description: Link the pinup to the said topic by passing topic ID

parameters.name: pinupID (ID)
parameters.pinupID: Pinup ID to identify & update the pinup
parameters.description: Validate the correct pinup using pinup ID

parameters.name: topicID (ID)
parameters.description: Validate the correct topic ID & linked pinup to the topic

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Updating the pinup topic using pinup ID & topic ID.

401.description: Topic ID & Pinup ID validation failure

post.description: Based on the invites, Singup the user using the email ID & Access token. Also set the domain same as the invited domain

parameters.name: emailID
parameters.description: Provide a valid email address to authenticate. e.g. your@some-domain.com

parameters.name: tokenValidation
parameters.description: Valid token provided thorugh the email

200.description: User signup successful

401.description: User signup failure

post.description: Get the list of the subdomain for user selection

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Success in getting the sub domain list

401.description: Unable to set the interest topic for user

post.description: Setting the interest topics for user

parameters.name: subdomainID
parameters.description: Provide a valid sub domain ID

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Success in setting the sub domain for the user

401.description: Failure in setting the sub domain for the user

get.description: Getting the list of the topic

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Set the topics interest for the user

401.description: Unable to set the interest topic for user

post.description: Setting the interest topics for user

parameters.name: topicID
parameters.description: Provide a valid pinup ID

200.description: Set the topics interest for the user

401.description: Unable to set the interest topic for user

get.description: Pinup home page for all the users, show the 5 latest from recent, related & recommended

200.description: Successfull get all top 5 recent, related & recommended

401.description: Failure to get recent, related & recommended

200.description: Success in getting the recent pinup items. Recently published pinups.

401.description: Failure in getting recent pinups

200.description: Successfull getting recommended pinup data, The pinup data needs to be based on the cookie set for the latest viewed pinups or the data set from the backend admin

401.description: Failed to get recommended pinup data

get.description: Related pinups using pagination for the topic

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Provide topic

200.description: Successfull get related pinups by topic. Show the latest pinups for the topic.

401.description: Failure to get related pinups for topic

post.description: User will be able to like/unlike the pinup

parameters.name: pinupID
parameters.description: Provide a valid pinup ID

parameters.name: like
parameters.description: Like/Unlike action to set the counter for Pinup Like

200.description: Pinup like count is being update with +1

401.description: Unable to update the like count with +1

message.example: Fetched the list of topics Successfully

example: Failure in fetching topic list
Failed to remove the topic
Topic Identifier (ID) not set, Topic Indentifier cannot be blank
Invalid Topic Identifier (ID), Topic Identifier doesn't exists

example.title: Angular2 Services
example.description: Services are JavaScript functions that are responsible for doing a specific task only. Angular services are injected using Dependency Injection mechanism and include the value, function or feature which is required by the application. There nothing much about service in Angular and there is no ServiceBase class, but still services can be treated as fundamental to Angular application.
example.tags: Angular 2, Tutorial, Overview, Environment, Hello World, Architecture, Modules, Components, Templates, Metadata, Data Binding, Data Display, User Input, Forms, Services, Directives, Dependency Injection.

example.title: Angular 2 - Directives
example.description: In this chapter let us study about Angular 2 directive. Templates of the Angular are dynamic, when these templates are rendered by Angular, it changes the DOM according to the directive fed instructions. The directive is a class which contains metadata which will be attached to the class by the @Directive decorator.
example.tags: Angular 2, Tutorial, Overview, Environment, Hello World, Architecture, Modules, Components, Templates, Metadata, Data Binding, Data Display, User Input, Forms, Services, Directives, Dependency Injection.
